notes: This script runs the GSEA software to perform a preranked gene set enrichment analysis. It uses a predefined gene set library (c2.all.v4.0.symbols.gmt) and a ranked list of genes (provided by the script's input variables). The script runs GSEA with specific parameters, including the number of permutations (nperm) and the minimum set size (set_min). It also uses the PBS job scheduling system for its execution.
